Is the number you are thinking of greater than 50? (y/n)
Is the number you are thinking of greater than 75? (y/n)
Is the number you are thinking of greater than 88? (y/n)
Is the number you are thinking of greater than 94? (y/n)
Is the number you are thinking of greater than 97? (y/n)
Is the number you are thinking of greater than 99? (y/n)
The number you are thinking is 100
